00022 #region Usings
00023 using System;
00024 using System.Xml;
00025 #endregion
00026 
00027 namespace Utilities.FileFormats.RSSHelper
00028 {
00032     public class Enclosure
00033     {
00034         #region Constructor
00035 
00036 
00037 
00038         public Enclosure()
00039         {
00040 
00041         }
00046         public Enclosure(XmlElement Element)
00047         {
00048             try
00049             {
00050                 if (Element.Name.Equals("enclosure", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00051                 {
00052                     if (Element.Attributes["url"] != null)
00053                     {
00054                         Url = Element.Attributes["url"].Value;
00055                     }
00056                     if (Element.Attributes["length"] != null)
00057                     {
00058                         Length = Element.Attributes["length"].Value;
00059                     }
00060                     if (Element.Attributes["type"] != null)
00061                     {
00062                         Type = Element.Attributes["type"].Value;
00063                     }
00064                 }
00065             }
00066             catch { }
00067         }
00068         #endregion
00069 
00070         #region Private Variables
00071         private string _Url = string.Empty;
00072         private string _Length = string.Empty;
00073         private string _Type = string.Empty;
00074         #endregion
00075 
00076         #region Properties
00077 
00078 
00079 
00080         public string Url
00081         {
00082             get { return _Url; }
00083             set { _Url = value; }
00084         }
00085 
00089         public string Length
00090         {
00091             get { return _Length; }
00092             set { _Length = value; }
00093         }
00094 
00098         public string Type
00099         {
00100             get { return _Type; }
00101             set { _Type = value; }
00102         }
00103         #endregion
00104 
00105         #region Public Overridden Functions
00106 
00107 
00108 
00109 
00110         public override string ToString()
00111         {
00112             if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_Url) && !string.IsNullOrEmpty(_Type) && !string.IsNullOrEmpty(_Length))
00113             {
00114                 return "<enclosure url=\"" + _Url + "\" length=\"" + _Length + "\" type=\"" + _Type + "\" />\r\n"
00115                     + "<media:content url=\"" + _Url + "\" fileSize=\"" + _Length + "\" type=\"" + _Type + "\" />";
00116 
00117             }
00118             return string.Empty;
00119         }
00120         #endregion
00121     }
00122 }
